scripts.clean: if [ -d dist/ ]; then rm -r dist/; fi
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn buildHtml && yarn buildCss && yarn buildCopy
scripts.buildGHPages: git checkout gh-pages; git merge master -m 'Automerge'; yarn build; git add -f dist; git commit -m 'Update build'
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist/ origin gh-pages
